lesson.subtitle: Checkpoint - Complex Sentences Part 2
lesson.description: Learner can demonstrate mastery of concessive, causal, temporal clauses
objectives: Learner can demonstrate mastery of concessive, causal, temporal clauses
Learner can use reported speech for statements, questions, and commands
Learner can self-assess readiness for B1.4 phase
